declarations.selector:
/*
 * Components Layer - Icons
 * ----------------------
 * Styles for icons and icon elements
 */

/* Base icon styling */
.ti

/*
 * Utilities Layer - Display
 * -----------------------
 * Display, visibility, and layout utility classes
 */

/* Display */
.hidden

/*
 * Utilities Layer - Spacing
 * -----------------------
 * Margin and padding utility classes
 */

/* Margin utilities */
.m-0

/* 
 * Bubble Background Styles - Only changes the background 
 * Preserves the existing washing machine animation
 */

#loadingIndicator

/* Fix for empty state positioning in List View */
.list-view .empty-state

/* Fix for card placeholder in list view */
.list-view .card-placeholder

/* Update text color to be readable on light blue background */
#loadingIndicator p

/* Fix for view-btn and refresh-btn states - matching main page style */

/* Reset all view-btn and refresh-btn states */
.view-btn,
.refresh-btn,
.toolbar .view-options .view-btn,
.toolbar .view-options .refresh-btn,
.viewer-content .toolbar .view-options .view-btn,
.viewer-content .toolbar .view-options .refresh-btn
